name: Voltaire and The Future of Network Governance on Cardano
description: When both a voting and treasury system are in place, blockchain can be truly decentralized. Our future will be in the hands of the community, who will have everything they need to grow and evolve an advanced socio-economic operating system to advance humanity.

speakers.name: Adam Rusch
speakers.bio:
Prof. Adam Rusch
Teaching Assistant Professor in the School of Information Sciences at the University of Illinois, as well as core contributor at Summon Platform, which offers DAO tooling. He was also the organizer / host for a CIP-1694 workshop exploring network-wide governance on Cardano, where we explored topics like delegative / liquid democracy and trusted off-chain data sources.
